title: 🇺🇸 Trump Intel — Feb 23, 2026 7:00 AM
content:
# 🇺🇸 Trump Intel Scanner — Monday, February 23, 2026 7:00 AM ET

## ⚠️ SCAN STATUS
**Web Search API:** Unavailable (missing Brave API key)  
**Sources Accessed:** Reuters, Fox News, White House, CNBC (via direct fetch)  
**Coverage:** Limited to extractable content from public news sites

---

## 🔴 CRITICAL ALERTS

### 1. Congress to Vote on Iran Strike Authority
**Category:** `military`  
**Source:** Reuters  
**Detail:** U.S. Congress could vote **as soon as next week** on whether to block President Trump's ability to strike Iran without congressional approval. U.S. military is preparing for potential serious conflict with Iran if diplomatic efforts fail.  
**Market Impact:** HIGH — Defense stocks, oil prices, geopolitical risk premium  
**Source URL:** https://www.reuters.com/world/us/

---

### 2. DHS PreCheck & Global Entry Suspended
**Category:** `policy`  
**Source:** Reuters  
**Detail:** Major U.S. airlines report DHS gave scant warning before temporarily suspending TSA PreCheck and Global Entry programs from Sunday, amid Department of Homeland Security shutdown.  
**Market Impact:** MEDIUM — Airlines, travel sector disruption  
**Source URL:** https://www.reuters.com/world/us/

---

## 🟠 IMPORTANT ALERTS

### 3. Historic Tariff Program — "Liberation Day" (April 2025)
**Category:** `trade`  
**Source:** Fox News  
**Detail:** Trump unveiled historic tariffs in April 2025 during "Make America Wealthy Again" event at White House Rose Garden. Administration imposed tariffs on goods from **Mexico, Canada, China**, and others. Trump argues tariffs will bring manufacturing jobs back to U.S.  
**Market Impact:** HIGH — Industrials, manufacturing, consumer goods, import-dependent sectors  
**Source URL:** https://www.foxnews.com/category/person/donald-trump

---

### 4. Federal Immigration Agent Killed U.S. Citizen (March 2025)
**Category:** `policy`  
**Source:** Reuters  
**Detail:** Federal immigration agent shot and killed a U.S. citizen in Texas in March 2025, months before Trump administration began deportation surge that led to shooting deaths of Renee Good and Alex Pretti.  
**Market Impact:** LOW — Political/legal, civil unrest risk  
**Source URL:** https://www.reuters.com/world/us/

---

## 🟡 NOTABLE ALERTS

### 5. White House Golden Age Messaging
**Category:** `policy`  
**Source:** WhiteHouse.gov  
**Detail:** Administration messaging emphasizes "Golden Age of American greatness" with focus on: border security (illegal entries at historic lows), energy dominance, AI leadership, economic growth, "peace through strength" doctrine ending eight wars.  
**Market Impact:** LOW — Broad sentiment, policy direction signals  
**Source URL:** https://www.whitehouse.gov/

---

### 6. NASA Artemis II Delay (Potential)
**Category:** `policy`  
**Source:** Reuters  
**Detail:** NASA taking steps to potentially roll back Artemis II rocket and Orion spacecraft to Vehicle Assembly Building after observing interrupted helium flow. "This will almost assuredly impact the March launch window," NASA said Saturday.  
**Market Impact:** LOW — Defense/aerospace contractors (Boeing, Lockheed Martin, Northrop Grumman)  
**Source URL:** https://www.reuters.com/world/us/

---

## 📊 SUMMARY

**Total Alerts:** 6  
**Critical (🔴):** 2 — Iran military conflict, DHS security programs suspended  
**Important (🟠):** 2 — Tariffs on Mexico/Canada/China, immigration enforcement casualties  
**Notable (🟡):** 2 — White House messaging, NASA delays

**Top Market Movers:**
1. **Iran conflict vote** — Defense, oil, geopolitical risk
2. **Tariffs** — Manufacturing, trade-sensitive sectors
3. **Travel disruption** — Airlines, TSA PreCheck/Global Entry suspension

---

## ⚠️ LIMITATIONS

**Truth Social:** Unable to access (requires API/proxy aggregator)  
**X/Twitter:** Unable to access (@realDonaldTrump, @POTUS feeds blocked)  
**Brave Search:** API key not configured  
**Most major news sites:** Blocked direct access (403/Cloudflare)

**Recommendation:** Configure Brave Search API key for comprehensive scanning:
```bash
openclaw configure --section web
```

---

## 📝 STRUCTURED OUTPUT

```
TRUMP|🔴|military|Congress to Vote on Iran Strike Authority|U.S. Congress could vote as soon as next week on blocking Trump's ability to strike Iran without congressional approval. Military preparing for potential conflict if diplomacy fails.|https://www.reuters.com/world/us/
TRUMP|🔴|policy|DHS Suspends PreCheck & Global Entry Programs|TSA PreCheck and Global Entry temporarily suspended from Sunday amid DHS shutdown, airlines report scant warning given to travelers.|https://www.reuters.com/world/us/
TRUMP|🟠|trade|Historic Tariffs on Mexico, Canada, China|Trump unveiled historic tariffs in April 2025 'Liberation Day' event targeting Mexico, Canada, China imports to bring manufacturing jobs back to U.S.|https://www.foxnews.com/category/person/donald-trump
TRUMP|🟠|policy|Federal Agent Killed U.S. Citizen in Texas|Immigration agent shot and killed U.S. citizen in Texas in March 2025 during enforcement operations before Minnesota deportation surge.|https://www.reuters.com/world/us/
TRUMP|🟡|policy|White House Golden Age Messaging|Administration emphasizes border security at historic lows, energy dominance, AI leadership, peace through strength doctrine ending eight wars.|https://www.whitehouse.gov/
TRUMP|🟡|policy|NASA Artemis II Launch Likely Delayed|NASA may roll back Artemis II rocket due to helium flow issue, will 'almost assuredly' impact March launch window.|https://www.reuters.com/world/us/
```
